Wrapper.Description: A VAST wrapper is a VAST response that does not contain a VAST inline ad but instead contains information about a redirect to a third party ad server. This allows different parties to serve ad inventory from a secondary ad server. A VAST wrapper redirect can also point to another VAST wrapper, creating a chain of VAST wrappers that finally point to a VAST inline ad. This is sample Wrapper ad tag presented by IAB TechLab. Modify VASTAdTagURI and other information as required.
